description: Master registry of all cognitive routines (Process Blueprints) available to the ResonantiA Protocol's WorkflowOrchestrator. This file serves as the definitive map for discovering and dispatching workflows.

cognitive_engine.description: Core workflows central to the RISE (Resonant Insight and Strategy Engine) and ACO (Adaptive Cognitive Orchestrator) cognitive cycles.

workflows.description: Master workflow for the RISE 'Knowledge Scaffolding' phase. Chains query refinement and temporal grounding.
Represents the second phase of the RISE engine, focusing on deep analysis and insight extraction.
The final phase of the RISE engine, synthesizing insights into a cohesive, actionable strategy.
A meta-workflow to invoke the full three-phase RISE engine on a complex problem.
The formal process for reactive self-correction and error analysis.
Guides the Synergistic Intent Resonance Cycle for proactive alignment with Keyholder intent.

analysis_temporal.description: Workflows specializing in time-series analysis, forecasting, and causal inference over time.

workflows.description: Performs temporal causal discovery to identify lagged effects and relationships in time-series data.
Uses predictive models to forecast future values from historical time-series data.
Deeply analyzes a query to identify and ground its explicit and implicit temporal constraints.

analysis_general.description: Workflows for general-purpose research, search, summarization, and analysis.

workflows.description: A multi-step agentic workflow for conducting comprehensive research on a given topic.
Takes a raw user query and refines it into a structured, deconstructed objective.
A simple, general-purpose analysis workflow.

system_management.description: Workflows for managing the protocol, SPRs, knowledge base, and system state.

workflows.description: Ensures synchronization between protocol documentation and implemented code/workflows.
A utility workflow for manually correcting or updating SPR definitions in the Knowledge Tapestry.
Simulates and traces the cognitive activation process when an SPR is triggered.
Compares the live protocol state with the documented wiki to ensure resonance.
Captures and crystallizes the current session's interactions and insights into a persistent format.

data_processing.description: Workflows for ingesting, parsing, and processing various data formats.

workflows.description: Orchestrates the parsing and analysis of multiple video files.
A workflow for processing a single video file.

specialized_protocols.description: High-concept, multi-domain workflows that orchestrate complex, specialized tasks.

workflows.description: A structured workflow for creative problem-solving and novel design, inspired by Tesla's methods.
A self-generating protocol workflow for system evolution and bootstrapping.
Validates and integrates self-modifying code or protocol enhancements generated by the system.

testing_and_validation.description: Workflows designed specifically for testing tools, validating system components, and running diagnostic checks.

workflows.description: A test workflow for the integrated Causal-ABM capabilities.
Tests the functionality of the Agent-Based Modeling tool.
Tests the functionality of the Causal Inference tool.
Tests the functionality of the Predictive Modeling tool.
